website_summaries.verdict: A mighty little camera that is a notch above what you'd expect to get your phone. Great to throw in your pocket and take anywhere.
pros: A reliable camera with WiFi capabilities that under most lighting conditions takes remarkably crisp photos
Lightweight with an 18x optical zoom, image stabilization, and an impressive video option
cons: Take extra care when storing, transporting, and handling because the casing is a little more fragile than you might expect

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I am so far very pleased with the camera. I am enclosing a few facts that may not be clear from the specification. () The weight of the camera (including the battery and a memory card) is 7.3 ounces. () The size of still-image files (jpeg) is between 4MB and 5MB. () The camera needs a reasonably modern memory card. If you have an older card (say, Class 2), it may be too slow, especially if you are planning to make movies. () The flash has a manual pop-up button, and then needs to be manually "folded" back into the camera, which a minor inconvenience. The camera does not pop it automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: SAMSUNG ABANDONS APP FOR THIS PHONE
customer_reviews.text: Have this camera and loved it.......until.......Samsung no longer supports their app, so you can no longer upload photos from your camera to your phone, or anything via their useless app. Thanks Samsung for caring about the thousands of people who have purchased this phone. Samsung products are definately off of my list of reliable products.
customer_reviews.author: Dennie

customer_reviews.title: Phone cameras are better than this
customer_reviews.text: It was an ok basic smart camera but not for the price. Doesn’t have great stability or zoom, and has a pretty serious fogging issue. The pacific beaches and waterfalls were hard to capture because if the fogging. In the southwest parks in the desert the zoom didn’t do much. The camera didn’t take good crisp clear pictures of any quality, even the lights in Vegas were too much for it. This shouldn’t have been labeled a Smart camera with how badly it uses the resources built into it. We used our phones at many locations and got better pictures than with this camera. Very disappointing experience.
customer_reviews.author: raymon b.

customer_reviews.title: Okay camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a Christmas present since her other camera broke. It has a ton of cool features, which I'm sure you've already read about them all, such as sending pics to Facebook, etc. Perhaps we haven't played around with the settings enough, but the pictures that we've taken with the camera don't seem all that great. To be quite honest, the picture quality seems almost on par with some of the newer cellphones. But I will fully admit we haven't had the camera that long, and perhaps we are using the wrong setting or something. Just seems like the picture quality would be a lot better for a camera like this.
customer_reviews.author: Normalization

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: Ok, the only thing that really bothers me about this camera, is its inability to compensate for movement. If the person holding the camera moves even the slightest bit, the picture will be blurry, so it's got to rest on something, which necessitates a tripod. Wifi feature works great with my iPad mini. Video is pretty good, though that's not what I bought it for. Zoom is surprisingly good. If you've got a steady hand or a tripod, you should definitely get this camera. This much camera will usually cost double the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tabasco24

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camera for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I do tons of micro close up work that needs good color reproduction...every day. I find the camera works better than my high end cannon and my Fujifilm and am now using it all the time. I was a bit disappointed that the wi fi requires a password every time as my router's password isn't an easy one and I cannot change it and still get service, so I just use the cable to transfer images. For the price, it is definitely well worth it...and I recommend you give it a try if you like taking good photos.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Thill

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this several years ago and apparently never left a review, this camera still works great, we love it
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Say cheese!
customer_reviews.text: I like this little point and shoot camera bc it has so many cool features on it, including the wi-fi which was the main deal-breaker for me. It takes good close ups from a distance, and updloads are really easy. I've only used it a few times so far, so I'm sure there's a lot more yet to figure out with this. Battery life is ok. I used it at a concert, took it fully charged, and it was dead after 4 hours. Not normal use for me for picture-taking anyway, so not sure if that's good or bad. I would still recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Crazishopr

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: For the amateur photographer who is basically just taking vacation and family photos, this is a great camera. It is very user friendly. We loved the touch screen in the back. It will also perform all of the features without the touchscreen, just incase you break it sometime in the future. Zoom is great, and was the motivation for buying this camera. It produces clear, crisp shots even when zoomed in all the way. Wonderful item and the price is more than reasonable. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: curlznlips

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed, my trip was kind of ruined
customer_reviews.text: Received mine Thursday, installed the battery and the card, left the camera charging all night, checked this morning, battery wasn't charged, I left it charging all day, and still says battery is not charged. I'm in New Orleans, and no camera, I even tried to charge it in my car, from Dallas to New Orleans, nothing! Camera shuts off and it shows that the battery is not charged
customer_reviews.author: ViLo

customer_reviews.title: Very fun Tech
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera. It is fast, takes clear and fast pictures, and the zoom is really good for a point and shoot sized camera. I love that it links up with my Samsung Note 2 phone and I can share pictures between the devices and even use my phone and a remote control to make the camera do basic commands like take pictures. Although it does have all these options and bells and whistles, it is still easy to use as a basic point and shoot camera as well. Just turn it on, set it to Auto and go!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This camera is better than any that I have bought in the past. It is easy to use, takes great pictures and is fast at taking photos one after another. Battery life is decent also and with a full charge it hasn't died on me yet, even going to the zoo taking a lot of pictures. I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants a good camera, at a decent price that takes great pictures and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery D. Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. It doesn't need as much light as my older cameras so I can usually take pictures in the house without a flash, which look more natural. My only complaint is that the zoom is a little slow responding, but after using it for a brief time I got used to it and its really not a problem anymore. The 18x zoom is very useful at times when you can't get close enough to take a picture up close. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Love this Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an up and coming trip however I have been taking pics around the house just to try the camera out. All the features worked as the post said it would and I am really enjoying posting directly to facebook without having to do any transfering of the pictures first. Oh you will need to purchase your own memory card but if you know that in advance you shouldn't have any worries.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact camera, good telescoping lens for capturing pictures at a distance.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little camera. Its compact, has good range for those long distance pictures, and the batter life has been better than expected. I am not a frequent user, but the days that I use it, the camera does well. I have had issues with the app and uploading pictures, but that wasn't a big selling feature for me. I did realize that the app worked better with my iphone than with my android.
customer_reviews.author: OscarN619

customer_reviews.title: I'm not even that picky about pictures but the pictures this thing took were so dull I had to return the camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera is very small given the zoom lens it has but unfortunately the pictures were less than vibrant. I'm not even that picky about pictures but the pictures this thing took were so dull I had to return the camera. At one point, it couldn't even make out a mountain that I was attempting to photograph.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this little camera! It's not a dslr, but I love having wifi and the ability to send the photos right to my phone. Some of the menus aren't the most intuitive, but once you use it you'll figure it out. This is a great camera for vacation, and I used it with some pc software to take some great family portraits. I like the action shot, I use it to get baseball shots... Overall, this is a great point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: Bekktek

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Canon camera- I literally could not take more than 1-2 pictures before having to replace the batteries. It is so nice to be able to pick up the camera when you want just a few shots and actually have it work! I love the touch screen and the fact it has Wi-Fi capabilities, altho I have not figured out yet how to use that. I am still learning. It seems to be a great camera, and takes very nice, clear pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a point and shoot camera that was good quality and had some ability to adjust to your own settings and this absolutely fit the bill. It connected easily to my WiFi network, (which was the main reason I wanted it) and I enjoy sending pictures via Email or posting to my Facebook account. I also love the 18x Optical zoom....great close ups. Also love that you can zoom while shooting video. Great camera at a great price. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: If you want this for Autoshare geotagging (gps), the US version of the iPhone app can't do it.
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice point-and-shoot and i'd love it for that but the sales lit that says you can Autoshare pics to your iPhone and the Samsung SmartCameraApp will use the iPhone's GPS to tag appears to be untrue. I spent about 40 minutes online with Samsung on this and they finally admitted the app doesn't work. So--if you don't care about the geotagging (or maybe it works with Samsung's own Android devices) it's a really nice point-and-shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Barrick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice!
customer_reviews.text: It is all I expected and more. I am still exploring the wonders of this little dynamo. The convenience of sending photo shots on spot via wifi is just awesome. Its lightweight. Handy. More features than you can imagine or even care to use. Convenient usb charging. Lens protection. Zooms like a pair of binoculars. Pictures are clear and crisp like that of a professional camera. My choice is is simply brilliant... Another winner! The only thing thats missing is a carrying case. Who said life is perfect?
customer_reviews.author: Pragmatist

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my daughter and she loves it. This camera has some basic android functionality and you have to be able to navigate thru some of the screens and functions to get the most benefit from it. You can quickly sync up to drop box, google drive, iPhone, etc. so you never have to worry about loosing your pics. The picture and zoom quality is really good and we were happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA J.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great camera
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for digital compact camera at a reasonable price, light weight and have WiFi. This one is perfect. There are newer model that cost about $150-$200 more for 21x Zoom and little higher MP but it will be way too much which I don't need. The extra money can be used to buy other items. There are so many (-) and (+) reviews, but for me it's 5 stars for what I need. I don't plan to be professional photographer anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: but my girlfriend is very happy with it and it takes pretty good pictures
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the camera a lot myself, as it was purchased as a gift, but my girlfriend is very happy with it and it takes pretty good pictures. We did use it over the 4th of July to try and take some pictures of fireworks and were a little disappointed in the clarity. Since it has a fireworks mode we thought the pictures would be pretty clear, but her Galaxy S3 ended up taking the better pictures in that situation. Besides that, no complaints, battery life is good and the picture's we've taken (besides the fireworks) are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Camera. I had it for a year now. and it is compatible to my Samsung phone and tablet. The video is full HD quality, though you can only video 2 minutes. Photos are clean, clear, and crisp. It is very durable, I dropped it once and the lens did not break. Surprised by that. Lots of extras on the camera that I do not even use. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera!!! Every weekend for a year or better I used this to video rodeos for my sons. It was very reliable and has great quality capturing the moments. Battery became finicky after a while, but I got a potable battery charger and cord and it worked for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Genessa S

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Good little camera for the price. Gave it to my wife as a present because she wanted something small instead of always lugging around her SLR camera. She loves this little thing. Has a lot of features especially for editing pictures. The best feature of all is the WIFI capabilities allowing for sending pictures directly to your phone. You can also email them or use social media which is a cool feature as well.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Bordelon

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Considering I bought this Camera for $80 and considering what i paid. it is a literal steal. dont expect DSLR quality but expect something very close. easy to use, easy to set up. image quality is good, though it can get a bit grainy when zoomed in. con: though it is advertise to be able to send pictures through email.. it really isn't practical.
customer_reviews.author: Christian O.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung WB250F Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera (Cobalt Black)
customer_reviews.text: I totally love this camera. touch screen. the videos are totally amazing. Small and can be easily carried about, and this doesn't prove a disadvantage as i have big hands however, as per flash, its quite uneasy as you have to press the button for it to pop up, besides I still haven discovered the option for forced flash (I hope it has). this is the only reason am giving it a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: sebabs32

customer_reviews.title: zoom control too fiddly....
customer_reviews.text: took ok pics for a small sensor camera... BUT the big problem was the zoom control was too goofy---you could not precisely zoom in and out at short increments....zooming to far or too short on shooting a picture....hard to get just right...... returned this camera and bought the Panasonic ZS 20 with way more picture taking quality...but does not have Wi-Fi....which does not matter to me.....
customer_reviews.author: Stevewb

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera Awesome features
customer_reviews.text: This camera has a lot of features your smartphones has, it also has a nice zoom and a nice brilliant touch screen to get to the other settings. The wifi is easy to set up and use to transfer or share your photos or videos to and from your PC, tablets or phones. Get a extra battery and a fast 32gb Sd card and you've got yourself a nice kit to take on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Apple Pi Techs

customer_reviews.title: More than satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Photo and video are excellent for this price range camera. It is compact and well suited for traveling. The controls are not placed to my liking, especially the on/off and the mic and speaker. Getting to some of the more common functions takes some studying. Sending email is somewhat clunky and takes some getting used to and the keyboard could use some improvement. The compartment door for the battery and SD card is pretty flimsy and would seem to be at risk. All-in-all, I would recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for an Inexpensive Camera
customer_reviews.text: Good camera. Takes beautiful pictures and is fairly intuitive. Nice and compact. It took me forever to figure out how to get the wifi to work properly, but that could very well have been user error. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: vooodooojen

customer_reviews.title: Good technology but bad function
customer_reviews.text: I give it three star because the camera has a nice size, is light and you can e-mail pictures or share them online directly from your camera. Also, it takes crystal clear picture ( day or night) as long as your object does NOT move. So the slightest move and you get a blurry picture. I bought this camera to take pictures from my 3 year old son....the only pictures that turn good are the ones I take when he is in asleep!
customer_reviews.author: Bethan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love my new camera
customer_reviews.text: Just got this camera for Christmas and I am amazed at the quality of my pictures. If I could figure our how to upload some with my review I would lol.. I downloaded the app on my phone to transfer pics straight from my phone to my camera and I absolutely love it!! I am recently getting into photography so I haven't figured alot out about the camera yet except that it takes really good photos lol. I am so happy that I got this camera for Christmas. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sahara E.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung WB250F digital camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera over all takes great pictures easy to use but one flaw with this camera don't buy it thinking it is easy to transmit your pictures to your email with the Wi-Fi it does not work. There is no way to send it to your email for some reason it will be blocked by yahoo mail you can send it to facebook but not everyone wants all there pictures on facebook!
customer_reviews.author: tam60

customer_reviews.title: Samsung WB250F Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is one of the best point and shoot cameras I have owned it takes amazing pictures as well as video and the zoom really reaches out there with clarity pretty durable i have owned the camera now for about 3 months or more and have been all over with the camera buy an extera battery just in case the battery life on the camera is really good you can get about 450- 500 pictures in without shuting the camera off before the battery dies maybe 300 with wifi on SD card go with a class 10 or higher to get the best quality from the camera even with a class 4 the pictures come out really well.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Brungardt

customer_reviews.title: No viewfinder and dark screen make for a bad photograph
customer_reviews.text: It took decent photos. But, the lack of a viewfinder is its shortcoming. In daylight, the display is too dark to see what's being photographed or whether or not it's in focus. I returned it and opted for a Canon power shot a1400, which works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife because the old Panasonic that we have had for years is slow to focus. This camera is much faster to focus and allows her to take puppy pictures easily in the house where the light is low. Pano stitching work great and is fun to use, size is nice and form works well in our hands. Just a nice all round camera that I would get again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Nicest Camera I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made camera the build quality is great. It's very easy to set up and takes great photos. I haven't used the Wi-fi feature yet but I plan to try it out very soon. I like the touch screen and the 18X zoom will be perfect for the landscape shots I like to take. For the price it's hard to go wrong with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Gordie

customer_reviews.title: BEST CAMERA EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST CAMERA EVER!!! I GOT IT TO TAKE PICTURES OF A SUMMER ART CLASS I WAS TEACHING FOR THE CHILDREN OF LEWISTON CA. IT NEVER TOOK A BAD PICTURE. I WAS ABLE TO PICK IT UP AND SHOOT AT RANDOM MOMENTS ON THE GO AND EVERY SHOT WAS CLEAR. IT ALSO HAS A LOT OF EXTRA FEATURES ON IT THAT ARE EASY TO USE. THE KIDS WERE ABLE TO USE IT TOO AND SOMETIMES IT WAS DROPPED BUT IT NEVER BROKE. IT WAS BETTER THAN I EXPECTED.
customer_reviews.author: nevaland

customer_reviews.title: Broke within one month
customer_reviews.text: Used it 3-4 times then lens cover quit opening; had a warranty that I bought with it but the fine print (although coverage starts at purchase) says it has to go thru manufacturer first (so why did I buy extra warranty?) Cannot find a contact seller button to discuss matter so now I am stuck with 1 month old broken camera. Good luck if you buy one.
customer_reviews.author: hope hanks

customer_reviews.title: Speechless
customer_reviews.text: I love this damn camera. I didnt take any pictures yet but the video side i use for a 4 hour recording. OMG.. This camera do everything I need it to do but one thing. The wifi upload to youtube is limited. small files only. Overall I love this camera. Samsung did it again... Forget DSLR. Im going with a WIFI wireless viewfinder... Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danteandroid4life

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would find a camera this good for this price. I am happy that I bought this instead of a a bit mor expensive canon or nikon. It's not like I'm a professional photographer or anything even close, so, for my needs, this camera gives me everything. The only thing I've founf a little difficult it's to focus when the zoom is to its maximum, other than that, nothing to complain about it. The wifi functionatilies make it a very up-to-date camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Meléndez

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: This Samsung is a very nice camera, takes good pictures and I like the Wi-Fi setting, although it takes me a while to figure it out whenever I use it. I have emailed pictures with it and posted directly, but the easiest thing to do is to have the pictures copied to my Samsung phone by Wi-Fi and then email from the phone, or post to facebook.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Its a decent camera but I wouldnt buy it again
customer_reviews.text: the camera is ok it takes decent pictures, but their not super vivid in color but it does take excellent pictures at night! and its super easy to upload to phone and computer over wifi!
customer_reviews.author: Adilah

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Features, and Style
customer_reviews.text: This camera has it all. Though lacking the megapixels that would take a picture the resolution of your living room wall, this camera is everything you need. The zoom is a bit slow compared to a physical method, but it's almost a rifle scope. The apps you get for this phone are quite superb, and uploading photos to your favorite cloud storage site is a breeze. If you're looking for a point-and-shoot that's packed with better quality and a plethora of features, look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: A good point and shoot camera -- good value
customer_reviews.text: In fairness, this camera may warrant more stars -- I have only used it a few times and haven't used most of the features. But of those I have used, I am very pleased with the camera. It's fairly easy to use and takes good quality photos. The WiFi was a really nice feature for backing up photos and/or posting to Facebook while traveling. It's light-weight, compact and seems to have a pretty good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D.

customer_reviews.title: Love that I can send photos to my Galaxy cell ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can send photos to my Galaxy cell phone via WiFi. It's a great camera too! Be sure your Android can download the app first if your main purpose for purchasing this camera is to upload photos directly from camera to mobile phone. Otherwise you can always send pictures to email addresses via WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: LaTisa

customer_reviews.title: I love the camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought a refurbirshed model for a vacation trip. It works well and I had many people ask me about it, partly because it is so attractive. I like the ability to send photos directly to email or Facebook, but I need to work on using this capability a little more. The size of the photo and the internet speed are controlling factors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this for my wife to take pictures on our upcoming trip. Very nice camera. It takes really nice clear pictures. The wifi is a nice feature and 18x zoom gets you up close to all the action. Haven't found a negative yet. The price was good and it has the features we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: SCSSTEVE

customer_reviews.title: I am not a professional but camera is easy to use and takes great pictures!
customer_reviews.text: Camera is easy to use right our of the box. I had no problem setting up the wifi. I just followed enclosed instructions. Camera foes not come with rapid charger I suggest you buy one but not the big John deal suggested after 3 charges it did not work in the camera .
customer_reviews.author: dorobee

customer_reviews.title: WOW Great Camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Camera and how I can link it to my Samsung phone as well. or send right from camera to my media sites like facebook. I would recommend this camera to any of my friends or family. Arrived on time even early light weight and love the silver look. Only wish it came in green. Also love the touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Klein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera!
customer_reviews.text: Camera works with my Android phone transfers the pictures I take to the phone, you can also email the pictures to your family and friends, I love it!. It also has several shooting modes to enhance your pictures. You can also shoot video, stop and then continue on from where you left off, without starting another video. Great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Kalina

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Does just what I wanted it to do.I wanted a camera that I could take a picture and e mail it or directly upload it to face book without needing to plug it into the computer. Having a lot of fun with it.I hated that there was no instruction book but playing in the menu was very easy to figure out
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Some problems
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace the same model camera that I broke. Performs pretty much like the old one but it won't email photos. It may be configuration. Will try to call customer support and update if it can be fixed,
customer_reviews.author: Randsom

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Facebook function, no support from Samsung
customer_reviews.text: I have had problems with the connection to facebook and other aps. It worked at first and now malfunctions. Samsung has been "looking" for a solution for months. I asked them to replace the camera and they said no.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Herschelman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA - FOOTAGE LINK IN REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this used, and I can't even tell it wasn't new. This white camera is a head turner. Responsive touch screen, crazy far optical zoom. Records sound great, and take awesome photos in low-light, and bright situations. Sync this camera to your phone via Wifi, and have the photos sent right to your device. See this camera in action at YouTube.com/thasmizofesv
customer_reviews.author: Skynet SMiZ

customer_reviews.title: Have taken this on a couple vacations and it has been great using this and also using my cellphone camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent point and shoot camera. Have taken this on a couple vacations and it has been great using this and also using my cellphone camera. This camera is small but kinda bulky because of the lense but will still fit in a pocket. I usually wear cargo shorts so I put it in my lower pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Artie Mcfly

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This camera really takes great pictures and it is so easy to send to my computer or Facebook that I love it. Also then I have more storage on the Sandisc because it is cleared when the pictures are downloaded by wifi
customer_reviews.author: Arm candi

customer_reviews.title: Fun Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun camera to use with a lot of neat features, but the picture quality is not the greatest. The zoom is good and the video is fair. The picture quality is not really bad, and for the price you really can't argue. It's plenty sufficient for posting pictures on the web or sending emails for social purposes. I've used it quite a bit and had a lot of fun with it, and I would recommend it for the price you can get it for. Just don't expect more than you should with the picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: FlashMan81

customer_reviews.title: I totaly love the camera
customer_reviews.text: I totaly love the camera.It's an older model but, it has everything I was looking for in a camera. I rated my first review a few days after I received it yet, I had not thoroughly check the camera. I knew it was used when I bought it but, I didn't know it had a crack in it's body. Like I said, I love the camera and I don't want to return it but, a discount would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ada Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a small, easy to take along digital camera with very good close-up ability. Only issue that makes me say bad words on occasion is that sometimes the close up keeps moving after I take my finger off the point where I want it and miss a shot. Nothing terrible and I am glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: D. H. Talley

customer_reviews.title: Faulty design on zoom lens
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little camera IF you can get it to work. I had the first one for less than a month when the zoom lens malfunctioned (extended then would not go back in). I returned the item for a replacement. The replacement has been working fine (very minimal use) until yesterday and when I started to use it to capture that breathtaking sunset the picture turned out very fuzzy and unfocused and then the zoom lens would not go back in and the camera becomes unusable at that point. I am returning again!!!
customer_reviews.author: longs

customer_reviews.title: Small, but very user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than we expected, but, it does a real nice job and is very easy to use. Battery seems to last a good amount of time and the view window is easy to see. Only complaint, the charger cord is too short.
customer_reviews.author: steamer

customer_reviews.title: pretty good camera
customer_reviews.text: So dar everything has worked and its a great little camera. The only thing odd is the cartoon mode sometimes its great other times its kinda ehhh. The WiFi ability is very useful especially since my gf who this was a gift for does not have internet or a working computer to upload otherwise. So she just uploads over WiFi at my house.
customer_reviews.author: multanii

customer_reviews.title: We spend our time finding a good spot to leave it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely won brownie points with the wife when I purchased this for her on xmas. We spend our time finding a good spot to leave it, then utilize our phones to see the image before actually taking the photo. Wirelessly transferring the photos to our TV is easy, and makes me seem like the IT hero I am. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Batman Revived

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use camera
customer_reviews.text: Indoor focus is a not very clear but outdoor takes very nice pictures. I am not very used to the touch screen on the camera as I occasionally touched them but I like that all other buttons are very easy to reach. Easy to take video. I am quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Excelente. La recomiendo 100 %
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera, is simply spectacular. I can upload photos directly to Facebook without wires and computers. The only detail that I did not like was the flash, for its position in the chamber is very delicate though I have not had a problem yet.
customer_reviews.author: HECTOR

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in November but it only worked for 7 months. Liked the WiFi features but many problems with this camera for the last month.
customer_reviews.author: Mona W.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Camera, Great Camera for the money, lots of features !
customer_reviews.text: You can take Great pictures & flip through them with the swipe of a finger on large screen aswell as Wi-fi share them to friends phones or cameras with a touch bump, or wi-fi to e-mail addresses ! Great buy ! Great Camera !
customer_reviews.author: MGB 57

customer_reviews.title: Camera work great
customer_reviews.text: Am still learning to use some of the features of this camera. It can do a lot of things that I may never need but have the option of doing if I want to take the time to learn. I really just needed a point and shoot. Do like the zoom feature it works really well, the camera takes very clear sharp pictures. Would recommend it to family and friends. Bought a Samsung because I think they put out a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Romer

customer_reviews.title: I love the camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my third..my first two broke when I dropped them. I love the special effects and ease I can work the camera. Bought the warranty as it was much cheaper than a big box store charges and it seems as I get older I drop the camera more often than the grandkids...
customer_reviews.author: Lake House Granny

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: The family loves it since the interface is similar to a modern smartphone with the connection to wifi. The camera itself takes great pictures in almost all of the different modes automatically. The automatic macro mode doesn't come out good all the time but controlling the setting in manual mode fixes it. All in all I'm really happy with it and is a good balance of features, quality, and price.
customer_reviews.author: Fishnphil

customer_reviews.title: Fragile Flash?
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, takes amazing pictures... My only complaint is I feel like I'm going to break the flash portion off by not remembering to close it.. Should have done my research as this probably isn't the best camera for me
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy flash
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughters birthday, seller shipped quickly, the quality of the pictures is great. She is thrilled with the Wi-Fi feature, I am concerned with the flash it comes up quite easily but you have to manually push it back in, flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, wrong power cord
customer_reviews.text: The camera did not come with a US AC charger cable, which is disappointing. The AC cord was for another countries electrical outlet, which means the camera was actually not a US model. That is NOT in the description and I purchased this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: K. Labrosa

customer_reviews.title: Loaded with Features
customer_reviews.text: Take your shot, which is easy. Then you can send it where you want to by email. The camera is compact, fits easily into a pocket, and is ready to work (stills or movies) quickly. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Cant believe one can get so many features for such a low price. Still learning it. I cant sync with samsung apps on ipads or iphone os7. I took off one star for this reason
customer_reviews.author: AlanK

customer_reviews.title: Purse camera
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something small, fast and better then my cell phone. For the price this does it all. I really like the ease of use and the small, light weight. It's fun and takes nice pictures. The video is not bad either. No complaints and good value.
customer_reviews.author: J. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great compact camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm still learning about all of the features but the pictures I've taken so far have been fantastic, they are sharp and clear. I did go online and print out the information on the camera and how to use it, I found that easier than the little booklet you get with the camera. I have no complaints with the camera. Easy to use, the battery last a long time, great pictures, love the touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Bassler

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: As a photographer, I have a D7000 but my wife doesn't like to use it because of it's size and intimidating buttons. We saw this camera and thought that this has just about everything you really need in a point and shoot. The wifi is a great bonus as well as the touch screen. I did have a bit of trouble with emailing photos to others from the camera but it seemed to sort itself out. I love that I can import photos to my computer with a push of a button.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact Camera with zoom and wi-fi
customer_reviews.text: Great zoom, great auto feature for those of us not photographers. I'd like to see a folder feature upon importing. Flash is awesome and works direct. Wi-Fi feature is a good tool, I still need to practice linking camera with smart phone but I did it once. Overall a great compact camera.
customer_reviews.author: Alma GM

customer_reviews.title: Great item, if you don't want to carry around a bulky PRO camera...still takes awesome shots, just not at night
customer_reviews.text: Love the wi-fi option! The images are super crisp...some friends thought the pictures from my trip were taken professionally! great videos too! One downside: not so great for low-light(even with the selection of low-light shots) or night time shots!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little camera.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a few digital cameras, and this one is definitely the best value to date. For this price you just can't go wrong. Is it perfect? Nope. But I'd buy it again in an instant. An outstanding little pocket or purse camera.
customer_reviews.author: D. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: All my wife does is rave about this camera. She enjoys it even more than our high $$$ camera. Very simple to use and has great picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Great camera features....not so user friendly though!
customer_reviews.text: For someone who'se NOT as tech savvy as I am, a couple of features needed to be explained to me. Also, it does not memorize the wireless network password I have at home -s o everytime I upload to my computer, I need to enter the password all over again!
customer_reviews.author: Chameleon

customer_reviews.title: recommended for non US power outlets.
customer_reviews.text: It was great quality but they sent the wrong one compatible to the USA standard plug outlets. Or you can use an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous101

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera mainly because it had the Wi-Fi features but I tried several times to upload some pictures to picasa but it did not work, could not send the pic to my email. In summarry: much more complicated to use the Wi-Fi features than I thought (and that was the only reason I selected this camera) After I return it I read other reviews of people who state also they could not upload/send pictures to internet or at least it did not work as easily as one expects.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Castaneda Ezcurra

customer_reviews.title: Great low cost camera
customer_reviews.text: The 18X Optical zoom works great. The battery life is good and the photo quality is good. I haven't spent any time on the detailed settings yet and the flash armature is a little funky but for the money, this is a very good out door use camera.
customer_reviews.author: Diice

customer_reviews.title: My daughters have greatly enjoyed using their camera's
customer_reviews.text: My daughters have greatly enjoyed using their camera's. They are easy to use with the motible features. They have enjoyed the easyness of the camera and how great their puctures turn out with clarity and professionalism.
customer_reviews.author: lCharlotte McKeever

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This camera is definitely a good bargain. It has all of the features of a modern camera and also has built in wifi and has some cool features like the best face feature!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MelR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: I primarily selected this Samsung camera because of it's ability to upload photos directly to email and internet. However , it is a very good camera in terms of taking great pictures. What more could one want?
customer_reviews.author: George J. Partington

customer_reviews.title: great price fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: great price and fast shipping, the camera is easy to use and looks great, I already ordered a memory card for it and the picture quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: michael hriciso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item exactly description and function very good, delivery on time, price is very good. I like it
customer_reviews.author: Ha Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this for my birthday and I love how easy it is to use, the wifi posting to facebook saves me so much time! Great quality pictures in a nice compact frame, excellent camera and an easy item to recommend! I got so use to using my iPhone, I had forgotten how nice pictures could look.
customer_reviews.author: Farns418

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Clear, sharp pictures. Unbelievable quality and awesome functions. I bought this as a gift for my husband's 60th birthday. But it was more of a gift to myself. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Janice RP

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love my camera i am a beginner photographer and this camera has helped me enhance my skills, it is light weight I love the rechargable batteries. The zoom is wonderful the flash is fantastic, the price was also very reasonable. I looked at other websites and they wanted to much for this. I also love love love the touch screen
customer_reviews.author: Lady T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for the price with large set of features
customer_reviews.text: Fulfills my expectations completely. I especially enjoy the Wi-Fi linkage system to download pictures and control it from my smartphone. Nice touches while taking excellent pictures and movies.
customer_reviews.author: EricK

customer_reviews.title: I love taking pictures with this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love taking pictures with this camera, I just wish the flash was easier to turn on. It has a button at the top that needs to be pressed down and a flash pops up. It seems to get stuck at times.
customer_reviews.author: Likolio

product_meta.title: Samsung WB250F Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera (Cobalt Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueTake crystal-clear photos and stunning video with the WB250F Smart Camera from Samsung. With features such as a 14.2-megapixel backside-illuminated sensor and an 18x zoom lens, the WB250F gives you the creative freedom to take great photos even in low-light situations. And with built-in Wi-Fi, you can easily and quickly share your best shots.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Take crystal-clear photos and stunning video with the WB250F Smart Camera from Samsung. With features such as a 14.2-megapixel backside-illuminated sensor and an 18x zoom lens, the WB250F gives you the creative freedom to take great photos even in low-light situations. And with built-in Wi-Fi, you can easily and quickly share your best shots.

The 14.2-megapixel BSI sensor is optimal for low-light performance. View larger.

A brilliant 3-inch touch display features easy navigation. View larger.

14.2-MEGAPIXEL BACKSIDE-ILLUMINATED CMOS SENSOR
The WB250F is equipped with a 14.2-megapixel backside-illuminated (BSI) CMOS sensor that gathers more light than conventional sensors. This allows you to take properly exposed images in low-light situations. With the Low Light Shot feature, the camera will automatically merge three continuous shots into one clear photo.

SHARP 18X ZOOM LENS PROVIDES PLENTY OF RANGE
The built-in lens has an 18x zoom range so you can easily frame the exact shot you want and get in close to the action when necessary. The lens starts at a wide 35mm-equivalent focal length of 24mm and zooms all the way to 432mm. With such a large zoom range, you'll have no problem getting everyone into the photo or zooming in on something far away.

COMPOSE SHOTS ON A 3-INCH HYBRID TOUCH DISPLAY
On the back of the camera is a brilliant, 3-inch display that lets you compose and review your photos comfortably and accurately. The display has a hybrid user interface that lets you use either the five-way button for menu navigation if you prefer traditional controls or your fingers if you prefer touch controls. Either way, the intuitive navigation makes setting controls and sharing images a snap.

FULL HD VIDEO RECORDING
The WB250F captures lifelike video at 1,080p Full HD resolution. The camera shoots video in the H.264 format, which allows you to record for longer than cameras using MJPEG video.

WI-FI CONNECTIVITY FOR EASY SHARING AND FACEBOOK UPLOAD
Thanks to built-in Wi-Fi, transferring your images and sharing them no longer requires memory cards or cables. You won't have to worry about running out of space, either.

With the dedicated Direct Link hot key, you can quickly connect to Wi-Fi networks. Once connected, you can save photos and videos directly to a computer or cloud service as you shoot. Print photos wirelessly or share them with your friends instantly by uploading them straight to Facebook or YouTube. With dual band Wi-Fi support, you'll have faster and more stable connections to the wireless networks around you.

CONNECT TO YOUR SMARTPHONE FOR MORE FEATURES
The WB250F works with Samsung's Smart Camera App (for iPhone and Android), which lets you instantly pair your camera with your smartphone and gives you features such as AutoShare and Remote ViewFinder.

When AutoShare is activated, all the pictures you take on your camera are automatically sent to your smartphone. Remote ViewFinder turns your phone into a viewfinder and lets you preview images, adjust camera settings, frame the scene, and tag the shot location from up to 30 feet away. When you need to take a group shot with yourself in it, Remote ViewFinder makes it easy.

CLOUD SERVICE BACKUP WITH MICROSOFT SKYDRIVE
Never worry about losing your photos, even if your camera is lost or stolen. If your camera is connected to Wi-Fi, the WB250F will automatically copy the images you take to a Microsoft SkyDrive account. This feature not only automatically backs up all your photos, but also lets you easily make more room on your memory card by deleting shots without fear you'll lose them.

SMART AUTO 2.0 FOR SHARP SHOTS EVERY TIME
The Smart Auto 2.0 feature automatically analyzes the current shooting environment and chooses the right mode to give you the best possible picture. And Smart Face Recognition remembers the faces of up to 20 of your friends and family and automatically focuses on them first, so your important subjects are always clear.

PRODUCT DIMENSIONS AND WEIGHT
The WB250F measures 2.43 by 4.18 by 0.85 inches (H x W x D) and weighs 0.41 pounds.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
WB250F Smart Camera, Li-Ion battery (SLB-10A), power plug, USB charging cable, wrist strap, start-up guide, and warranty card.

WB250F SMART CAMERA
COBALT BLACK
AT A GLANCE:
 * 14.2-megapixel BSI sensor for optimal low-light performance
 * 18x zoom lens provides versatile range
 * 3-inch hybrid touch display with easy navigation
 * Built-in Wi-Fi for easy sharing and data transfers
 * Captures Full HD Video

Select your shooting mode with the rotator dial. View larger.

Automatically send photos to your smartphone with AutoShare. View larger.
feature_bullets: Capture Detailed Images in Low Light situations with a 14PM BSI CMOS Sensor
Share your Best Photos Instantly with Family and Friends with Built-in Wi-Fi
Samsung color designation is "Cobalt Black". Black refers to the color of the lens. Camera color is a dark blue.
